promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic gorilla electric-type pokemon wearing a yellow and teal crown. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thundrilla, a a massive basic gorilla electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Pika Strike. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "electric" or "Thundrilla". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, gorilla-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This almighty primate channels lightning to energize its Pika Strike. Often spotted atop peaks, it protects its territory with electrifying roars.
